PrecisApproval for the NATIONAL RESEARCH COUNCIL OF CANADA to renew its COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with THE PROFESSIONAL INSTITUTE OF THE PUBLIC SERVICE OF CANADA covering all employees in the INFORMATION SERVICES GROUP, for a three-year term expiring on June 20, 2007.
